column4: i can't seem to get to this specific website (ruizbelvis.org). It works on my other computer which run winxp w/out any issues. I can ping it and it resolves to the correct IP. comparing traceroutes with my winxp system, they are identical, except that on my xubuntu system, it gets a 'no reply' after hop 16. trying telnet on port 80 doesn't work, nor does using wget work either. any suggestions?
getting to other websites aren't a problem.
i'm not having a problem getting there
i'm not having a problem getting to it
okay, what do you think it making it so that i'm not able to access it?
not sure, you having problems getting anywhere else
there may be a problem with a router between you and it and its not letting you get there, like its getting hung and its timing out
nope.. none whatsoever... google.com, yahoo.com any any other website comes up fine.
i would think so to.. but my other winxp system is on the same router and accesses it w/out any issues.
where do these release names come from? (i'm sure its in the FAQ.....)
do you think it's worth reinstalling xubuntu on it?
i fixed the issue, although i'm not sure why that would be the problem.
i turned off my router and switch and restarted them.
thanks for all your help. have a good one
